attributes.action: stop Allerton Grange High School, Leeds, changing their school uniform for the school year 2009-2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We wish for the new school uniform of Allerton Grange to be scrapped and the current uniform to be kept.
This is as over 80% of pupils in the school are opposed to it and it would damage the morale of the school severely.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the school.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
